text:
(1)
Farming on Staten Island: A scene of hay making at Mount Loretto, Hylan Boulevard, between Sharrott Avenue and Ottilie Street.

P. L. Sperr

(2)
Another view.

P. L. Sperr

(3)
Another view, at a later date. On the extreme right appears St. Joachim and St. Ann's Church, at Mount Loretto.
June 27, 1932.

P. L. Sperr
